alert.note: Alert for Crowley County (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 18 at 4:32PM MDT by NWS Pueblo
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of west central Kiowa and northeastern Crowley Counties through 515 PM MDT... At 431 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 12 miles south of Forder, or 38 miles north of La Junta, moving east at 15 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This storm will remain over mainly rural areas of west central Kiowa and northeastern Crowley Counties. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 800 PM MDT for southeastern Colorado.
